item.description: body { margin: 0; position: fixed; top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; background: DarkSlateBlue; font-family: 'Share Tech Mono', monospace; color: white } a { color: white } g.tickline { stroke: lightgrey; stroke-dasharray: 2, 2; } .axis-label, .series-label { fill: lightgrey; } Joyplot + Wired Tweet Bots infographic An attempt at recreating the Wired infographic about tweet bots, using the activity data from the "
